AI Studio Uganda
Playground Developers Research Impact

Our Mission

Safety First.
Culturally Grounded.

We are pioneering the development of AI safety frameworks specifically designed for the African context. Our research prioritizes data sovereignty and the mitigation of bias in low-resource languages.

Ethical Framework

AI models trained on Western data often fail to capture the nuances of Ugandan culture and values. Our "Crane" safety alignment process involves direct feedback from community elders and linguists.

Data Sovereignty

Ensuring that data generated in Uganda benefits Ugandans. We advocate for local ownership of datasets.

Bias Mitigation

Rigorous testing against local benchmarks to prevent cultural erasure and representational harm.
